main.name: Vishal Maurya
main.bio: I am a professional game developer with extensive experience and expertise in gameplay optimization, UI, multiplayer, and gameplay mechanics. After developing various hypercasual games for over 3 years in my weekend projects and industrial experiences, I am exploring oppurtunities in game development for AAA titles and Indie games. Academically, I am a fourth year undergraduate student of Physics major at IIT Kharagpur, where  i enjoy strolling around the campus and participating in various vibrant events whenever I am not developing games or vested in exams.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to make awesome games!

work.title: Game Developer Intern
work.description: As a Game Developer Intern at Tower Conquest: Metaverse, I brought my expertise in implementing gameplay features using Finite State Machines and resolved bugs related to synchronization and parameters. I integrated with back-end server APIs and designed UI screens for PvE and PvP game modes. This internship taught me the ins and outs of game development while working on a cutting-edge Web3-based game.

work.title: Unity Game Developer Intern
work.description: As a game development intern, I implemented multiplayer features in StarHunt using Firebase and added rewarded ads to Fight-Back with Android SDK and AdMobs. I also designed and developed Giant-Runner's gameplay, UI, and levels. Through these projects, I gained experience in Firebase, AdMobs, and game development, honing my skills in Unity, C#, and mobile development.

projects.title: Balance | Unity
projects.content: Get ready for heart-pumping excitement with my timer-based game, where players maintain gas levels by tapping on bubbles. My WebGL build ranking 69th among 600+ participants is published on itch.io, showcasing my skills in game development and problem-solving under tight deadlines. Experience the thrill at https://mvishal2002.itch.io/balance and get ready to feel the rush!

projects.title: Unarmed | Unity
projects.content: Presenting my action-packed game where enemies spawn one after another to kill the player having limited ammo. I programmed the AI movement using Nav Mesh and ensured that the player receives new weapons whenever ammo runs out. I designed various shaders and particle effects in Unity, and integrated SFX to give the game an elegant look. With this project, I've showcased my expertise in game programming and design.

projects.title: HummingBirds | Unity
projects.content: Get ready for some intense competition! I designed and trained an AI agent to take on players in a mini-game using Unity ML-Agents and Python. Players compete against AI to gain as much nectar from flowers around them with time against their side. Through this project, I gained expertise in designing and training agents, using Multi-Layer Perceptron structure, and analyzing training results using TensorBoard.

projects.title: Flying Rick | Unreal
projects.content: Run for your life in my hypercasual endless runner game! Developed using Unreal Engine and C++, the game features various obstacles and powerups to keep you on your toes. Through this project, I gained expertise in level designing, behavior trees, and using blueprints and C++ together. I also designed the UI for the main menu, game, and game end screens, and added stylish SFX to enhance the experience.

testimonials.text: Vishal has demonstrated his skills with self motivation to learn new skills. He exceeded our expectations and completed his projects on time.
